bill_title: broaden the policy review committee for animal damage control.

bill_versions.bill_text: FOR AN ACT ENTITLED, An Act to broaden the policy review committee for animal damage control. BE IT ENACTED BY THE LEGISLATURE OF THE STATE OF SOUTH DAKOTA: Section 1. That § 40-36-46 be amended to read as follows: 40-36-46. There is created an interagency joint policy review committee for animal damage control consisting of the secretary of game, fish and parks, animal damage control supervisor, secretary of agriculture or his designee, two animal industry representatives nominated by ag industry groups and selected by the Governor, a representative of the United States Fish and Wildlife Services, and a county commissioner selected by the state county commissioners association for the purpose of reviewing animal damage control activities and to develop for the purpose of developing program priorities for controlling animal damage in South Dakota. 180 copies of this document were printed by the South Dakota Legislative Research Council at a cost of $.052 per page. . Insertions into existing statutes are indicated by underscores. Deletions from existing statutes are indicated by overstrikes.

action_log.status_text: First read in House and referred to
